mobiles.name: Castle Fishmonger
mobiles.long_description: A fishmonger is standing here looking after his stall.
mobiles.description:
A happy old fishmonger is standing here selling his fish and generally chatting
to the people around him.

mobiles.name: Jokers Castle Guard
mobiles.long_description: One of the Joker's Castle Guards is here, keeping the peace.
mobiles.description:
This is one mean dude. He has been specially recruited by Joker to keep an eye 
on the Castle and stop trouble makers.

mobiles.name: small child
mobiles.long_description: A small child is here playing with his teddy bear.
mobiles.description:
Aww ... it's enough to make you sick. A cute little boy playing with his new
teddy bear.

mobiles.name: small child
mobiles.long_description: A small girl is sitting here playing with her doll.
mobiles.description:
A small cute little girl with pigtails is sitting here playing with her 
favourite dolls.

mobiles.name: castle weaponsmith
mobiles.long_description: The castle's best weaponsmith is here, polishing his large weapon.
mobiles.description:
He is a big hairy brute, who looks like he probably shaves with a few on the
weapons he owns! Still, I'm sure he knows a good deal when he sees one.

mobiles.name: castle baker
mobiles.long_description: The castle's baker is here, and her buns look really nice!
mobiles.description:
Hmm .. this is a woman who loves her own cooking! Mind you, you can smell why.
You just salivate at the smell! Yummy!

mobiles.name: Castle Cook
mobiles.long_description: A large cook stands here, rolling her dumplings.
mobiles.description:
Yep, another one who doesn't care about her ever expanding waist line! When she
arrived at the castle she was a mere slip of a girl. Now the gates do not open
wide enough for her to get out!

mobiles.name: Castle Armourer
mobiles.long_description: The castle's armourer is here, and he's got an impressive helmet.
mobiles.description:
Are there no small people on this continent?? This one is huge too, must be
someting in the water. Anyway, he's got a most impressive colection of armour,
but it's not cheap.

mobiles.name: castle grocer
mobiles.long_description: The castle's grocer is standing here rearranging his spuds.
mobiles.description: This old man is red faced from being caught out playing with his goods!

mobiles.name: Jokers Castle Guard
mobiles.long_description: One of the Joker's Castle Guards is here, keeping the peace.
mobiles.description:
This is one mean dude. He has been specially recruited by Joker to keep an eye
on the Castle and stop trouble makers.

mobiles.name: Jeweller
mobiles.long_description: The castle jeweller is standing here polishing his family jewels
mobiles.description:
A small set man, slightly balding with small eyes that are currently keened on a
particularly nice looking gemstone.

mobiles.name: mapseller mapmaker
mobiles.long_description: The castle mapseller is standing here, doodling on scraps of paper.
mobiles.description:
This man is wierd, he likes walking all over the place and then drawing out maps
of where he has been. There are countless scraps of paper blowing around the
floor as to the where abouts of the nearest public toilet!

mobiles.name: Magician
mobiles.long_description: The castle magician is here, and he's got crystal balls too!
mobiles.description:
He sells everything wierd and wacky, from normal scroll of spells to tarot cards
and crystals.

mobiles.name: Elixir vendor
mobiles.long_description: The castle elixir vendor is standing here, and he's got somthing nasty brewing.
mobiles.description:
This is the sort of person you should never go out for a drink with, mainly
because when he's in a bad mood someone ends up turning a rather gross shade of
green and vomiting all over the floor.

mobiles.name: castle healer
mobiles.long_description: The castle healer is here, tending to the sick and needy.
mobiles.description: Wow ... she is stunning, and she's willing to heal you ... what a shame.

mobiles.name: leather worker
mobiles.long_description: The castle leather worker is here.
mobiles.description:
This man is infamous for the goods that he supplies Joker and his endless women.
If you listen carefully you can sometimes here the whipping sounds as another
one of his products is put through it's paces.

mobiles.name: brik a brak
mobiles.long_description: A rather suspisious looking person is here.
mobiles.description:
Hmm ... Most of this stuff looks like it's fallen off the back of a cart, down a
cliff and been jumped on by serveral fat women in BIG boots!

mobiles.name: locksmith
mobiles.long_description: The castle locksmith is here, looking rather busy.
mobiles.description:
The castle locksmith is said to be the only one of his kind in the world, and he
carries a fair old stock with him too. This man can literally open doors for you.

mobiles.name: White Knight
mobiles.long_description: The White Knight stands here, looking hard.
mobiles.description: Nah, maybe another day of living would be better.

mobiles.name: Black Knight
mobiles.long_description: The Black Knight is here looking macabre.
mobiles.description:
Hmm, he doesn't look happy. Maybe someone has just died. Chances are, he killed
them!

mobiles.name: castle barkeep
mobiles.long_description: The castle barkeep stands here, waiting to serve you.
mobiles.description: This is a man who likes his drink, looks like he drinks the profit.

objects.name: sprouts
objects.description: The scourge of the univers lays here .... SPROUTS!!

objects.name: steel plate

objects.name: bottle Lemonade

objects.name: bottle beer

objects.name: shot whisky

rooms.name: On the top of the cliff
rooms.description:
You are standing on top of a cliff, overlooking a golden beach and a deep 
blue sea. From here you finally catch a glimp of one of the most impressive
castles you have ever seen in your life. Which is a wonderful entrance to
this fine continent.

rooms.name: On a clifftop path
rooms.description:
You are standing on a path that leads towards a huge castle in the distance.
As you look around, the wind blows over the tops of the cliff which is nice
and refreshing.

rooms.name: On a path to the castle
rooms.description:
The path widens as you approach the castle. Up ahead you can see a main road 
that obviously links up some of the large areas on this side of the sea. But 
the biggest thing for miles around is the castle.

rooms.name: The main approach to the castle
rooms.description:
The path has now joined the main road that goes to and from the castle. There
is a large moat and a huge entrance gate to the castle.

rooms.name: On a bridge over the moat
rooms.description:
You are now standing on a bridge that goes over the moat for the castle. The 
moat looks murky and smell, who knows what lives in it ... if anything possibly
could!

rooms.name: The castle entrance
rooms.description:
You are standing in front of the castle, which has the biggest portcullise you
have ever seen! As you glance through the entrance you see a large courtyard 
full of poeple bustling around. And what appears to be some form of market
inside.

rooms.name: The castle courtyard
rooms.description:
You area standing at the entrance of the castle courtyard. In front of you is 
one of the largest and most splendid markets you have every seen. The most
colourful stalls and full of all types of people bustling around looking at 
all the goods for sale.
There is a sign on the wall here ...

extra_descr_data.description:
Joker decrees that there wil be no fighting in the courtyard of his castle, 
so as a mark of his word he has cast a powerful spell so that there will 
be no fights under his keen eye.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
As you wander through the colourful stalls, your eyes are treated to delight
after delight. Such an abundance of colours and smells that attack you senses.
Even the fish stall to the north smells nice, and you thought fish stalls 
always smelt bad.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
As you look around you see a most impressive collection of weapons from all 
over the world. There all here for you to buy. And the weaponsmith has kindly 
informed you that he is expecting delivery of a larger new stock.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There are bits of armour hanging up all over this stall. The brilliant sheen 
as the sun shines off of the highly polished armour blinds you momentarily.
There is bount do be something you would like to buy.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There is a small gap in between the market stalls, however you are convinced 
that in time another stall will appear. To the east is the entrance and to 
the west is the armour stall.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There is a small gap in between the market stalls, however you are convinced 
that in time another stall will appear. To the south is the armour stall, 
the north is the elixir vendor and to the east is the grocer.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The grocers stall is here. This stall has all sorts of different vegetables.
Alas, the only down side to this stall is that it sells brussel sprouts.
Joker must have not noticed them ...... argh sprouts!

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There is a small gap in between the market stalls, however you are convinced 
that in time another stall will appear. To the north is the healers, to the 
west is the gorcer, to the east is the fishmonger's.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The fishmonger's stall is here. Laid out in front of you is the most impressive
collection of fish you have ever seen. There are fish of every size and of
every colour under the sun. And the are so fresh, they're still wriggling.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There is a small gap in between the market stalls, however you are convinced 
that in time another stall will appear. To the north is the mapseller, 
the west is the fishmonger and to the south is the weaponsmith.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The Elixir vendor's stall is here. There are glass bottles containing a variety
of concoctions. Who knows what they are, the vendor seems to be as high as a 
kite. And he looks like he's just putting anything into each mixture.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There is a small gap in between the market stalls, however you are convinced 
that in time another stall will appear. To the north is the baker's stall, 
west is the elixir vendor, the south is the grocer and ot the east is the healers.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
You enter the healers sanctum, immeditaly everything seems more tranquil and
peacful.You are immeadiatly relaxed. You wonder, is it really worth leaving 
this place?

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There is a small gap in between the market stalls, however you are convinced 
that in time another stall will appear. To the north is the cook's stall, to 
the west is the healer, to the south is the fishmonger and to the east is
the mapseller.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The mapseller's stall is here. And he has maps of all over the place. If you
really need to find somewhere, then this man can help. He's been everywhere.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The leather worker's stall is here. He has all sorts of equipment. Some of 
the goods have been tested by Joker and his many women. There are all sorts
of whips, harnasses and restraints hanging up here.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The baker's stall is here. And there is the most impressive collection of 
cakes,buns and other assorted goodies. You just cannot help but salivate.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
Aha! You have found the bar ... you'll often find Joker hanging around here,
as running the mud can be a thirst task, and where better to relax than in
the Joker's own personal bar.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
Hmmm home cooking, this is the cook's stall. They say the way to a mans heart 
is through his stomach. Possibly true, but through the chest with a blunt spoon 
is FAR more painful. However, you could just die for this food. It' just smells
yummy!

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
This is the brik a brak stall, and these goods look rather suspect. But it 
cannot be that bad, or his stall would not be tolerated.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The jewellers stall is here. You have never seen such a glittery stall. And 
the owner claims they are all genuine. You cannot but assume they are, as Joker 
would not tolerate second rate goods being sold in his castle.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There is a small gap in between the market stalls, however you are convinced 
that in time another stall will appear. To the west is the jeweller's, 
to the south is the bakers and to the east is the magician's.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The magicians small stand is here. If you want something thats magical, then 
this is the place. He makes the most useful stuff in the world! And what's 
more, it's not too expensive.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
There is a small gap in between the market stalls, however you are convinced 
that in time another stall will appear. To the east is the locksmith, the west 
is the magician and to the south is the cook's stall.

rooms.name: The castle market
rooms.description:
The locksmith's stall is here. He's not really supposed to be in here, but he
always manages to find a way in. So at the moment he is lurking in the corner
trying to avoid Joker.

rooms.name: Path by the castle.
rooms.description: A small, overgrown path runs alongside the castle wall here.

rooms.name: End of the path.
rooms.description:
The path ends here, completly overgrown with bushes and weeds.
There is a murky looking pool to the south.

rooms.name: The murky pool.
rooms.description:
There is a small pool here, it is filthy, and looks putrid.
Definatly not the sort of place you want to go swimming.

rooms.name: An Archway.
rooms.description:
You stand in an archway at the edge of the castle courtyard.
A mosaic of the symbol for clan Ventrue adorns the floor.

rooms.name: An Archway.
rooms.description:
You stand in an archway at the edge of the castle courtyard.
A mosaic of the symbol for clan Nosferatu adorns the floor.

rooms.name: An Archway.
rooms.description:
You stand in an archway at the edge of the castle courtyard.
A mosaic of the symbol for clan Cappadocian adorns the floor.

rooms.name: An Archway.
rooms.description:
You stand in an archway at the edge of the castle courtyard.
A mosaic of the symbol for clan Malkavian adorns the floor.

roomtext_data.output: $n wimpers as the wall collapses on them !!
roomtext_data.name: all

rooms.name: An Archway.
rooms.description:
You stand in an archway at the edge of the castle courtyard.
A mosaic of the symbol for clan Tremere adorns the floor.

rooms.name: An Archway.
rooms.description:
You stand in an archway at the edge of the castle courtyard.
A mosaic of the symbol for clan Gangrel adorns the floor.

roomtext_data.output: $n fades from view as vines suddenly shoot from the wall !!
roomtext_data.name: all

rooms.name: An Archway.
rooms.description:
You stand in an archway at the edge of the castle courtyard.
A mosaic of the symbol for clan Toreador adorns the floor.

roomtext_data.output: $n fades from view leaving a small bottle of wine behind !!
roomtext_data.name: all

rooms.name: An Archway.
rooms.description:
You stand in an archway at the edge of the castle courtyard.
A mosaic of the symbol for clan Brujah adorns the floor.
